summary: This mod adds a Dovahkiin follower into the game! Description below:
descriptionHtml:
Dovahkiin Follower stats:
Race: Nord (essential).
lvl 80-infinite(scales with player).

Has the same immunities as the ebony warrior such as wabbajack,paralyze and ice form.

Immune to the 3 words of unrelenting force shout and mehrunes razor insta-kill.

Knows the following spells/shout:
Command daedra
conjure dremora lord
ebonyflesh
flamecloak

Disarm
dragon aspect
fire breath
ice form
unrelenting force

Has the same perks that the ebony warrior has.

Located in whiterun(entrace).
author: Glen
